resources.string:
Your mission:
 * find the key that opens the boxes containing weapons, ammunition and explosives.
 * find your weapon.
 * find ammunition.
 * find explosives.
 * kill the enemies that approach (your firearm and ammunition required).
 * destroy enemies bases with explosives.
 Be careful, you will avoid the mines laid in different places by your enemies.
First place you at the center of the playing area, then confirm
The area where the munitions are
The area where the weapon is
The area where the explosives are
The area where the key is
